title: ETA on DJ sona?
body:
Just curious if she will be this upcoming patch or next patch.  When they previewed the lunar revel skins it took about three weeks for them to come out.  Thinking sona will probably be the same.

Anyone know?

replies.body: She won't be in Patch 5.3. We haven't officially announced a release date for her.
Hey Katey, will the old Lunar Revel skins be on sale individually at all? Or only in the bundles?
Both! You can get her in the bundle, or individually.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w3aAEVYk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-10T22:11:53.911+0000)
>
> She won't be in Patch 5.3. We haven't officially announced a release date for her.

Ty katey!  Giving you an upvote. Dj sona looks awesome.  Ethereal is my fave.  Hoping the music track gets fleshed out more before release.  Crossing my fingers she will be released in 5.4.
So if u had to guess how many weeks what would u say katey ima sona mid main i already changed my name for this it feels like iv been waiting all ma life.

I usually play support and Sona has always been my favourite. The old version or the new... The 325 MS.. I simply don't care what Riot decides to do with her as long as she is around. Now, they are making the BEST skin in game for my favourite champion. RITO PLS, I simply cannot wait for it! Bring it in the next patch. I already put aside the money for her new skin :P
5.4 if we're lucky, otherwise I'd guess 5.5.
No, it will take much longer. She's got a LOT of little bugs to find and fix. It's already been officially confirmed she will NOT be out in 5.3.
I'm really excited to see DJ Sona's release too
